long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Cargo Truck is an interesting game by moving the vehicle through the mountains, controlling the vehicle so that it does not overturn. The game will have levels from easy to difficult, your job is to pass as many levels as possible, the classier you will be. Press space bar to brake, up button to run forward
